article_node.title: The Federative Republic of Brazil Announces Pricing of its New Bonds Offering
article_node.summary: Brazil priced a new bond offering on September 2, 2025, issuing $750 million of 5.5% 2030 bonds and $2.5 billion of 7.25% 2056 bonds. The 2056 bonds will partly fund a tender of old bonds, which expired on September 2. The new bonds will be listed on the London Stock Exchange and are expected to close on September 11, 2025. The offering is limited to institutional investors and is not a public sale.
